carrier.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom
ARC Newsletter

Important: Settlement Schedule Change Effective PED 03/29/20

ARC is moving its cash draft and disbursement day from Friday to the following Wednesday, ten days after the sales week closes, beginning PED 03/29/20 (with disbursement moving from Friday, April 3, to Wednesday, April 8) and will repeat weekly until further notice. Effective with the sales period ending April 5, 2020, the processing of all cash sales refunds will be deferred to the last processing/output cycle of the week, i.e., Cycle 7. Click here for more information.

ARC’s new API enables airlines to instantly confirm the status of U.S.-based travel agencies and their authority to issue tickets.

Read More

Important: Settlement Schedule Change Effective PED 03/29/20

ARC is moving its cash draft and disbursement day from Friday to the following Wednesday, ten days after the sales week closes, beginning PED 03/29/20 (with disbursement moving from Friday, April 3, to Wednesday, April 8) and will repeat weekly until further notice. The Tuesday sales report submission deadline will not change, and credit card transactions are not affected. Click here for more information.

Airline Refund Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds.

Learn More

Annual Agency Affirmation

Once a year you must review and affirm key information about your agency. Please note, you must disable your pop-up blocker, have Adobe Flash installed and have access to the Accreditation tool in order to complete the Affirmation.

Affirm Now

Important Message to Agencies: Settlement Schedule Change Effective PED 03/29/20

ARC is moving its cash draft and disbursement day from Friday to the following Wednesday, ten days after the sales week closes, beginning PED 03/29/20 (with disbursement moving from Friday, April 3, to Wednesday, April 8) and will repeat weekly until further notice. The Tuesday sales report submission deadline will not change, and credit card transactions are not affected. Click here for more information.

Important Message to Airlines: Settlement Schedule Change Effective PED 03/29/20

ARC is moving its cash draft and disbursement day from Friday to the following Wednesday, ten days after the sales week closes, beginning PED 03/29/20 (with disbursement moving from Friday, April 3, to Wednesday, April 8) and will repeat weekly until further notice. Effective with the sales period ending April 5, 2020, the processing of all cash sales refunds will be deferred to the last processing/output cycle of the week, i.e., Cycle 7. Click here for more information.

Airline Refund Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds.

Learn More

How is new distribution capability (NDC) impacting corporate travel today? This research explores NDC adoption, engagement and sentiment among some of the world’s leading TMCs.

Learn More

login.ads: Welcome to My ARC
login.body:
What is NDC & how does it work? At today’s @ASTAAgents Corporate Advisory Committee Meeting, ARC’s VP of Product, Doug Mangold, answers these questions & gives a comprehensive view of #NDC in the air travel industry. Learn more about ARC supporting NDC

Learn More

Despite devastating hurricanes in late 2017, air ticket purchases to areas less impacted remain very strong in 2018. Overall, average ticket prices decreased 4% #ARCdata #SpringBreak

Learn More

The theme for this year’s TravelConnect is “Transforming Together” and will feature Dan Clay, Wayne Best and Holly Hegeman. #TravelConnect2018

Learn More
